title: Major Companies Use Python
shortDescription: Google, Netflix, Instagram, Spotify, and many other tech giants rely on Python!
detailedDescription: Python is used by some of the world's largest technology companies for various applications. Google uses Python for many internal tools and services, Netflix uses it for their recommendation algorithms, Instagram's backend is largely Python-based, and Spotify uses it for data analysis and backend services. NASA, Dropbox, Uber, and YouTube also heavily rely on Python.
